hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: AbulQasim (ﷺ) said: When one of you is in the sun (Shams)--Makhlad's version has "fay'"--and the shadow withdraws from him so that he is partly in sun and partly in shade, he should get up

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْجُلُوسِ بَيْنَ الظِّلِّ وَالشَّمْسِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding sitting party in the sun and party in the shade
